snippet.title: Go-Go Town! release date trailer - PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description:
Go-Go Town! is set to have a ton of options to shape your very own city. Construct shops, hire staff, automate deliveries with couriers, and attract tourists to town, all while managing infrastructure and avoiding catastrophes. 

www.pcgamer.com

Twitter: twitter.com/PCGamer
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pcgamer_mag
Instagram: @pcgamer_mag
Facebook: facebook.com/pcgamermagazine
Forum: forums.pcgamer.com

To subscribe to the magazine in the US, UK, or elsewhere, visit magazines direct

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
